ygData.subject: (OOC, JP, Unicron's Plan)
ygData.msgSnippet: Basically, while Shockwave and his army fend off all the attackers.  Then your Predacon army will focus solely on the Cybertronian Fire and obliterate it.

Basically, while Shockwave and his army fend off all the attackers.  Then 
your Predacon army will focus solely on the Cybertronian Fire and obliterate 
it.
